title: Mom's lemon pie
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '1 (7g) sachet active dried yeast', '180ml milk, warmed', '2 teaspoons caster sugar', '200g butter or margarine', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '375g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', 'For the filling', '1 large lemon', '150g caster sugar']
